t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads

s: 3 hours ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million.
